question: 費用
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>expense</kanji> of <kanji>use</kanji> is the <vocabulary>expense</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>cost</vocabulary> we have to pay, I'm afraid. If you use something, there'll be expense.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
